1_1.en: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

3_15.zh: 我要使你和女人互相敌对，也要使你的后代和女人的后代互相敌对。他会打碎你的头，你会咬伤他的脚跟。”
3_15.en: And I will put enmity between you and the woman and between your offspring and her offspring. He will crush your head, and you will strike him in the heel.”

5_5.en: So all the days of Adam’s life amounted to 930 years, and then he died.

3_14.zh: 帝对摩西说：“我要成为什么，就成为什么。”又说：“你要告诉以色列人：‘那称为“我要成为什么，就成为什么”的，派我到你们这里来。’”
3_14.en: So God said to Moses: “I Will Become What I Choose to Become.” And he added: “This is what you are to say to the Israelites, ‘I Will Become has sent me to you.’”

5_10.zh: 监工和以色列人的工头就去告诉以色列人：“法老说：‘我不会再给你们麦秆。
5_10.en: So the taskmasters and their foremen went out and said to the people: “Here is what Pharʹaoh has said, ‘I am giving you no more straw.

32_14.zh: 于是耶和华改变主意，没有按照他说的那样降祸给他的子民。
32_14.en: So Jehovah began to reconsider the calamity that he had spoken of bringing on his people.

5_3.zh: 渴望满足心灵需要的人有福了，因为天上的王国是他们的。
5_3.en: “Happy are those conscious of their spiritual need, since the Kingdom of the heavens belongs to them.

7_12.zh: 所以，无论什么事，你们希望别人怎样对待你们，你们就要怎样对待别人。其实，这就是法典和先知书所教的道理。
7_12.en: “All things, therefore, that you want men to do to you, you also must do to them. This, in fact, is what the Law and the Prophets mean.

28_20.zh: 然后他郑重地吩咐门徒，不要向任何人说他是基督。
28_20.en: teaching them to observe all the things I have commanded you. And look! I am with you all the days until the conclusion of the system of things.”
